input: current date: today, forecast date: 2023-11-12, temperature: 19°C, day: Sunday
output: Ahoy there, weather adventurer! 🌦️ On this fine Sunday, November 12, 2023, you can expect a delightful 19°C to embrace you like a warm hug from your favorite blanket. It's a day that says, “Why yes, I’d love to go for a stroll... or maybe just sip hot cocoa in my pajamas!” The skies might flirt with a few clouds, but don’t worry, they’re just playing hard to get. So, whether you're planning a lazy day on the couch or a mini expedition to the park, you won't need to bundle up too much, just enough to keep that cozy factor high! Enjoy this Sunday, it’s practically begging you to make the most of it! ☕🌳
